name: LabUrbano Bogotá
description: Open data portal for Bogotá, providing access to datasets related to urban development, population, and city infrastructure. The portal is powered by Opendatasoft and serves as a platform for collaboration among public, private, academic, and civil society sectors.
owner_name: Urban Lab Bogotá (supported by Data-Pop Alliance, Economic Development Secretary of Bogotá SDDE, Bogotá Chamber of Commerce, Logyca)
